traversal.name: Convert from new to old types and do some cleanup

node.name: Icm
node.description: Using TRAVsons, COMPid would be applied to ICM_ARG1.

son.name: Imports
son.description: symbols imported and exported by the module

node.name: Typedef
node.description: definition of a user defined type

attribute.name: VarNo
attribute.description: Deprecated. TODO: This should be eliminated.

attribute.name: LiftedFrom
attribute.description: only for ST_spmdfun

attribute.name: Worker
attribute.description: only for ST_spmdfun

attribute.name: Companion
attribute.description: only for ST_spmdfun

attribute.name: AkvId
attribute.description: Identifier for function instances with akv-arguments (used for function naming in renameidentifiers.c)

attribute.name: InlineCounter
attribute.description: Counter for how many times the function has been recursively inlined.

flag.name: WasOptimized
flag.description: TRUE if function should be accounted for next optimization cycle again

attribute.name: VarNo
attribute.description: Deprecated. TODO: This should be eliminated.

attribute.name: Objdef
attribute.description: Deprecated. TODO: This should be eliminated.

flag.name: IsInUse
flag.description: Used to mark unused function arguments in DeadCodeRemoval. Marked arguments are removed in signature simplification.

attribute.name: VarNo
attribute.description: Deprecated. TODO: This should be eliminated.

flag.name: HasBeenEliminated
flag.description: Used in ArrayElimination to mark vardecs that are not used anymore. These are later freed by DCR

attribute.name: Reference
attribute.description: List of artificial return values which correspond to reference parameters

attribute.name: String
attribute.description: In case of constant character arrays defined as strings, this attribute holds the original definition. TODO: This should be eliminated as soon as possible.

attribute.name: ICMtext
attribute.description: Deprecated. Still used in the compiler backend until major redesign of backend node structure.

attribute.name: NT_Tag
attribute.description: Deprecated. Still used in the compiler backend until major redesign of backend node structure.

attribute.name: Indent_Before
attribute.description: the default value has to be fixed!

attribute.name: Indent_After
attribute.description: the default value has to be fixed!

attribute.name: Fundef
attribute.description: please delete me!

node.name: CSEinfo
node.description: This node is not located in the AST, it is only used internally by CSE.

attribute.name: DeclType
attribute.description: stores the declared type, iff present.

attribute.name: Alt
attribute.description: Used by CompareTree to remember alpha conversion

attribute.name: AliasMask
attribute.description: Used by by Interface Analsysis in order to obtain the transitive hull of variable aliases.

flag.name: IsAlias
flag.description: Set by the Alias Analysis traversel, AVIS_ISALIAS denotes whether there can be more than one identifier for a given data object.

flag.name: IsDead
flag.description: Used by MarkMemVals traversal in order to indicate which VARDECS are no longer needed and can thus be eliminated.

flag.name: First
flag.description: Flag whether the sync-region is the first one of the current SMPD-region

flag.name: Last
flag.description: Flag whether the sync-region is the last one of the current SMPD-region

attribute.name: Code
attribute.description: if present, the used counter for the code needs to be increased

son.name: Vec
son.description: After explicit allocation (EMAL), Vec points to an N_id node.

son.name: Ids
son.description: After explicit allocation (EMAL), Ids points to an N_exprs-list of N_id nodes.

son.name: Idxs
son.description: After explicit allocation (EMAL), Idxs points to an N_exprs-list of N_id nodes.

type.name: NodePointer
type.description: wird bei der correct-type function ausgelassen, da nicht klar war, wie mit dem Arraytyp umgegangen werden soll.

type.name: NodePointer
type.description: wird bei der correct-type function ausgelassen, da nicht klar war, wie mit dem Arraytyp umgegangen werden soll.

attribute.name: Code
attribute.description: if present, the used counter for the code needs to be increased

attribute.name: Code
attribute.description: if present, the used counter for the code needs to be increased

attribute.name: Funlist
attribute.description: Pointerlist to all function instances

attribute.name: SpecCounter
attribute.description: Number of specialized function instances

attribute.name: RefCounter
attribute.description: Number of all (known) function instances

attribute.name: InlCounter
attribute.description: Number of inlined function instances

attribute.name: AkvCounter
attribute.description: Used in type_upgrade for counting created function instances with AKV-arguments.
